welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Herzogenrath, a charming city known for its rich history, beautiful landscapes, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay. We hope you have a wonderful time here!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal building with check-in counters, security, and departure gates.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional and low-cost flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
